com.sun.identity.policy.InvalidNameException

  • Packages that use InvalidNameException 
    Package Description
    com.sun.identity.policy
    Provides classes for policy administration and evaluation.
    com.sun.identity.policy.interfaces
    Provides interfaces for writing custom Policy plugins for Conditons, Subjects, Referrals ResponseProviders and Resources.
